price: د اسمانو، ځمكې او څه چې پكى دې، ټولوباچایي يوازې الله لره ده او هغه په هر څه قادر دى.
arabic: لِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا فِيهِنَّۚ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرُۢ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: lillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā fīhinna wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
